author: ekmcmahon
post: I am a firm believer. While I think I understand why they are doing it. I am somewhat shocked and dismayed at all the actions and reasons that some folks are going through trying to denigrate God’s gift to us. It was written in pre Christian era documents what was going to take place, the Lord knew what was ahead of him in his human body when he was praying in the garden and it came to pass. The Shroud is as a quick but deep reminder that it did in fact take place..
title: If the shroud is a forgery, where are its precedents?
